scripts.predev: sass src/style.scss dist/style.css --no-source-map && postcss dist/style.css --no-map -o dist/style.min.css
scripts.build: sass src/style.scss dist/style.css --no-source-map && NODE_ENV=production postcss dist/style.css --no-map -o dist/style.min.css && node build/hash-css.js && rm dist/style.css
